programme.title: Day in the Life of a Coach - Sean Quinn
programme.sub-title: Day in the Life of a Coach - Sean Quinn
programme.desc: After retiring from his wrestling career Sean Quinn still wanted to compete. He viewed his discovery of Brazilian Jiu Jitsu as a natural progression to MMA. As Sean takes us through his day, we see life from the perspective of somebody who doesn't like to rely on others. Inspired by his own childhood in which he did not have access to a gym and coaching, he has turned that around, becoming a coach and owning his own gym.

programme.title: Out of the Cage - Melissa Croden
programme.sub-title: Out of the Cage - Melissa Croden
programme.desc: In this episode, Melissa Croden speaks about some of the things she struggles with as a fighter and how she overcomes those obstacles. Find out how Melissa started out this fight with nerves and anxiety but how she pulled out a huge win against Brittany Paterson.

programme.title: Day in the Life of a Coach - Francisco Azevedo
programme.sub-title: Day in the Life of a Coach - Francisco Azevedo
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Fransisco Azevendo as we delve into the life of a coach.
